# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: Твір як я провів зиму на англійській мові 10 речень

Відповідь: 1. This winter I enjoyed many outdoor activities like skiing and snowboarding. 
2. I also built a snowman with my friends and family.
3. I participated in a local sledding competition.
4. I went skating on the local ice rink.
5. It was really fun to visit a local holiday market.
6. On the coldest days I liked to stay indoors and bake cookies and hot chocolate.
7. I read some cozy winter books by the fireplace.
8. I curled up with a blanket and watched some holiday movies.
9. I made a special effort to attend holiday gatherings with my friends and family.
10. All in all, I had an amazing winter and enjoyed every moment of it.
